00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 Bool_t EventNavigator::ConnectInput(const char* input_file_name,
00043                                         Bool_t read_only)
00044 {
00045   //For now we  dont support identical output files
00046   if (read_only == false){
00047     std::cout << "WARN:  " << "re-writable files not supported!"
00048               << std::endl;
00049     read_only = true;
00050   }
00051 
00052 
00053   //Not very careful about tidying up after failures or repeat attempts
00054   //here.  Probably doesen't matter since the program is likely to
00055   //abort shortly afterward.  Revisit if that is not true.
00056 
00057   //Open the file
00058   fInput = TFile::Open(input_file_name, (read_only ? "READ" : "UPDATE"));
00059   if (!fInput || fInput->IsZombie())  return false;
00060   //if (!read_only && !fOutput) fOutput = fInput;
00061 
00062   //Look for setup tree
00063   TTree* setup_tree = 0x0;
00064   fInput->GetObject("SetupTree", setup_tree);
00065   if (!setup_tree || setup_tree->GetEntriesFast() == 0) return false;
00066 
00067   //Look for data tree
00068   TTree* event_tree = 0x0;
00069   fInput->GetObject("EventTree", event_tree);
00070   if (!event_tree || event_tree->GetEntriesFast() == 0) return false;
00071 
00072   //All set
00073   fSetupTree = setup_tree;
00074   fEventTree = event_tree;
00075   return true;
00076 }
00077

00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 Bool_t EventNavigator::ConnectOutputFile(const char* output_file_name,
00081                                          Bool_t append)
00082 {
00083   //Not very careful about tidying up after failures or repeat attempts
00084   //here.  Probably doesen't matter since the program is likely to
00085   //abort shortly afterward.  Revisit if that is not true.
00086   TFile* prev_output = fOutput;
00087 
00088   fOutput = TFile::Open(output_file_name, (append ? "UPDATE" : "RECREATE"));
00089   if (!fOutput || fOutput->IsZombie()) return false; 
00090   
00091   return true;
00092 }

00097 void EventNavigator::CopyTree()
00098 {
00099   //DEBUG_PRINT
00100   Long64_t nentries = fEventTree->GetEntries();
00101   //nentries = 100;
00102   TGlobalData* event = new TGlobalData();
00103   fEventTree->SetBranchAddress("Event", &event);
00104   fEventTree->GetDirectory()->Print();
00105 
00106   //DEBUG_PRINT
00107 
00108   fOutput->ls();
00109   gFile->ls();
00110   TTree* out_tree = new TTree("output_tree", "out");//fEventTree->CloneTree(0);
00111   TTree* out_tree2 = new TTree("friend", "Friendly tree");
00112   out_tree->SetName("ouput_event");
00113   out_tree2->SetName("friendly_event");
00114   Int_t something; Int_t something_else; Float_t ratio;
00115   out_tree->Branch("Event", &event);
00116   out_tree->Branch("demo",&something,"demo/I");
00117   out_tree->SetAutoSave(1000000);
00118   out_tree->AddFriend(out_tree2);
00119   out_tree2->Branch("mode",&something_else,"mode/I");
00120   out_tree2->Branch("R",&ratio,"R/F");
00121   out_tree2->SetAutoSave(1000000);
00122   
00123   Long64_t i;
00124   DEBUG::check_clock();
00125   for (/*Long64_t*/ i=0; i < nentries; ++i){
00126     //std::cout << "on entry" << i << "/" << nentries << std::endl;
00127     //fEventTree->GetEntry(20);
00128     fEventTree->GetEntry(i);
00129     something = i % 25;
00130     something_else = i % 7;
00131     ratio = (1. * something) / (1+something_else);
00132     out_tree->Fill();
00133     out_tree2->Fill();
00134     //out_tree->AutoSave();
00135     out_tree2->AutoSave();
00136     
00137     if ( i ==    1 || i ==    2 || i ==    5 ||
00138          i ==   10 || i ==   20 || i ==   50 ||
00139          i ==  100 || i ==  200 || i ==  500 ||
00140          i % 1000 == 0 ) {
00141       std::cout << "Event " << i  
00142                 << ": \t" << DEBUG::check_clock().str
00143                 << "\t" << DEBUG::check_mem().str 
00144                 << std::endl;
00145       
00146     }
00147     //std::cout << "map size: "<<event->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.size() << std::endl;
00148     typedef std::vector<TPulseIsland*> PI_list_t;
00149     typedef std::map<std::string, PI_list_t> PI2CM_t;
00150     typedef PI2CM_t::iterator PI2C_iter_t;
00151     int npi  =0; int npi2 = 0;
00152     for (PI2C_iter_t it = event->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.begin();
00153          it != event->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.end(); ++it){
00154       npi += it->second.size();
00155       PI_list_t& bank = it->second;
00156       for (int pui = 0; pui < bank.size() ; ++pui){
00157         delete bank[pui];
00158       }
00159       bank.clear();
00160       npi2 +=  it->second.size();
00161       //typedef std::vector<int> PIdata_t; 
00162       //PIdata_t samples = 
00163       //for (int s =  
00164       
00165     }
00166     //std::cout << "N islands: "<< npi << std::endl;
00167     //std::cout << "After del: "<< npi2 << std::endl;
00168     
00169     
00170     //event->Clear();
00171     //ClearGlobalData(event);
00172     fEventTree->Clear();
00173     out_tree->Clear();
00174     out_tree2->Clear();
00175   }
00176   std::cout << nentries << " Entries" << std::endl;
00177   delete event;
00178   out_tree->Print();
00179   out_tree->AutoSave();
00180   out_tree2->Print();
00181   out_tree2->AutoSave();
00182   
00183   fOutput->ls();
00184   fOutput->Close();
00185   //DEBUG_PRINT
00186 
00187 }
